p: Aerial parts of L. paniculata were collected in the flowering stage in March and April 2019 in the El Tablon sector in the Loja province of southern Ecuador, at an altitude of 1000 m.a.s.l. The geographical coordinates were 3°30′41.9″ S 79°09′18.2″ W, 704948.6E -9611806.7N -3.511648, -79.155052. Nixon Cumbicus identified the plant in the Herbarium of the Universidad Técnica Particular de Loja (HUTPL). The plant collection was authorized under governmental permission (MAE-DBN-2016-065).
